title: Florida star Clayton drops 34, closes out Auburn
description: Walter Clayton Jr. pulls through for Florida again as Gators fend off Auburn late to make program's first national title game since 2007.
author: Myron Medcalf

title: Bird, Moore, Melo, Donovan lead '25 HOF class
description: Sue Bird, Maya Moore, Carmelo Anthony and Dwight Howard are among those selected for enshrinement into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame.

title: Tearful Mullins savours career peak after National success with son
description: Willie Mullins says he has reached the peak of his career as a trainer after his jockey son Patrick leads home an unprecedented 1-2-3 in the Grand National.

title: Why Aston Villa are a club transformed - and how good could it get?
description: With Aston Villa having won seven games in a row and challenging on three fronts, BBC Sport examines manager Unai Emery's impact on the club.

title: 'No way it's a penalty' - Arteta fumes as Arsenal lose more ground on Liverpool
description: Mikel Arteta was left unhappy at the decision to award Everton a penalty in their 1-1 draw as Arsenal lost more ground to Liverpool in the Premier League title race.

title: Hits & misses: Did Arteta get it wrong at Everton?
Centerville grad picks Horizon League program
description: Apr. 5â€”Centerville High School graduate Rich Rolf announced his commitment to Youngstown State on Saturday. Rolf, a 6-foot-7 forward, entered the transfer portal on March 26 after three seasons at Charlotte. He averaged 3.8 points and 2.8 rebounds in 30 games in 17.2 minutes per game after sitting out his freshman season as a redshirt and missing all but three games in his redshirt freshman ...

title: Florida' Clayton delivers again to outduel Auburn's Broome in Final Four matchup of All-Americans
description: Two all-Americans, one chance to get their team a chance to win a national championship. Clayton scored 34 points to outduel Auburn's Johni Broome as the Gators beat the Tigers 79-73 on Saturday night at the Final Four.
author: JIM VERTUNO
